com.xtructure.xevolution.gui.components
Class GuiListener

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xevolution.gui.components.GuiListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
public class GuiListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener

GuiListener is an ActionListener and MouseListener that updates the appropriate components in the "Generations" and "Genealogy" tab of the XEvolutionGui when the user interacts with it.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
